title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 March 2017 - XWiki
content:
<Ulydev> has quit  
00:32 <Ulydev> has joined #xwiki  
00:32 <Ulydev> has quit  
00:32 <Ulydev> has joined #xwiki  
00:32 <Ulydev> has quit  
00:51 <david876534> has joined #xwiki  
00:56 <david876534> Hello, would there be any reason to not use vector assets for the icon drawables? Thanks

01:38 <Ulydev> has quit

06:20 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki

07:55 <sgc072> has joined #xwiki  
08:10 <sgc072> has quit  
08:12 <sgc072> has joined #xwiki  
08:28 <bromero> has joined #xwiki  
08:34 <bromero> Hello there, I'd like to ask about an issue that I've been through a long time but first I'd like to thank you all for the amazing job you are doing with the xwiki, regarding the issue I belive it's caused by permissions, but I already rechecked them, there are some menus that I'll attach in image links which I see the path file instead of the fancy name: http://www.imagebam.com/image/10c154538661078  
08:36 <bromero> It also happens in the WIKIS Descriptor page: http://www.imagebam.com/image/f6dd89538661247  
08:38 <bromero> Aaand in the admin menu: http://www.imagebam.com/image/44d856538661599  
08:42 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:10 <msmeria> has quit  
09:23 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:54 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
10:01 <vmassol> good morning  
10:02 <vmassol> FYI I'm planning to move the blog app out of platform and into contrib next week once 9.2RC1 has been released. Let me know if you have an issue with this. This is to help Denis and Mohamed with their new blog impl.  
10:03 <vmassol> bromero: hi  
10:03 <vmassol> what I can think of  
10:03 <vmassol> it could be caused by some translation pages that have been removed  
10:03 <vmassol> I'd need to check where these translation keys are coming from  
10:04 <vmassol> ok found the place  
10:04 <vmassol> they are in WikiManager.Translations  
10:05 <vmassol> so check that this page exists in your wikio  
10:05 <vmassol> so check that this page exists in your wiki  
10:35 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <floflobel> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <vmassol> guys we have some memory errors for http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-webstandards/  
10:41 <vmassol> checking memory but it's probably already high  
10:41 <vmassol> -Xmx2048m -XX:MaxPermSize=768m -Xms512m -XX:ThreadStackSize=2048  
10:44 <vmassol> pushing to 3072 to test  
10:45 <vmassol> there's probably a memory leak somewhere  
10:46 <vmassol> tmortagne: maybe you could check this test failure: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform\_Quality/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-extension-handler-xar/3799/testReport/org.xwiki.extension.xar.internal.handler.packager/DefaultDocumentMergeImporterTest/testMergeInteractiveChangesNoConflict/  
10:46 <vmassol> I'll check http://ci.xwiki.org/job/XWiki%20Contrib/job/application-faq/job/master/  
10:48 <vmassol> cool it worked for webstandards  
10:49 <vmassol> there are 3 tests failing now  
10:49 <vmassol> so 35 less than before  
10:49 <vmassol> but those 3 are still related to memory  
10:49 <vmassol> :(  
10:53 <msmeria> has quit  
10:56 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:04 <vmassol> FYI I’m going to upgrade the pipeline plugins on ci.xwiki.org and thus restart it  
11:09 <vmassol> tmortagne: can I stop the platform build that's running now to restat ci?  
11:09 <vmassol> (asking since it's running after a commit of yours apparently)  
11:09 <sgc072> has quit  
11:09 <vmassol> btw there are failing tests already in that build  
11:12 <vmassol> ok restarting  
11:13 <faichelbaum> Hi guys. Do you have an idea how to publish global notifications about new/updated contents from a xwiki 9.1.2 to Slack or any webhooks or emails at least ?  
11:14 <vmassol> faichelbaum: by mail it's easy  
11:14 <vmassol> since that's what we call the watchlist  
11:14 <vmassol> !search watchlist  
11:15 <faichelbaum> many thanks :)  
11:15 <vmassol> hmm no luck ;)  
11:15 <vmassol> see http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Watchlist+Application  
11:15 <faichelbaum> aye  
11:15 <bromero> hi there vincent, should it be in wikipage.com/xwiki/bin/WikiManager.Translations ?  
11:15 <vmassol> bromero:  
11:15 <vmassol> no  
11:15 <vmassol> it should be in /bin/view/WikiManager/Translations  
11:16 <vmassol> (what I gave you is what we call the reference to the page)  
11:16 <bromero> oh, okay  
11:16 <bromero> let me check that  
11:16 <bromero> it doesn't exists, 404  
11:17 <vmassol> for example on playground.xwiki.org it's at http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/WikiManager/Translations  
11:17 <vmassol> so it means someone or something deleted that page which is not correct  
11:17 <vmassol> you culd check your activity stream maybe to see if you can spot who did this  
11:18 <vmassol> maybe check your trash  
11:18 <vmassol> to see if it's there and can be undeleted  
11:18 <bromero> I misspelled a letter  
11:18 <bromero> it's there  
11:19 <vmassol> can you check its gistory  
11:19 <vmassol> can you check its history  
11:19 <vmassol> see if someone made a change to it  
11:19 <bromero> it was changed  
11:19 <bromero> should I revert it?  
11:19 <vmassol> maybe someone who's not admin saved it  
11:20 <bromero> it seems so  
11:20 <vmassol> you'll need to edit it with a user having admin permissions  
11:20 <bromero> yep  
11:20 <vmassol> edit and save  
11:20 <vmassol> this page registers translations for the whole wiki and thus requires admin privileges  
11:21 <bromero> it worked  
11:21 <vmassol> if someone without admin permissions saves it, the translations get unregistered  
11:21 <vmassol> cool  
11:21 <bromero> thanks a lot vincent :D  
11:21 <vmassol> yw  
11:21 <bromero> you really helped me out there  
11:21 <bromero> :)  
11:26 <vmassol> glad  
11:57 <msmeria> has quit  
12:00 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
12:06 <vmassol> so regarding ci we're quite good  
12:06 <vmassol> there are just 2 issues  
12:06 <vmassol> - one that I raised above and for which it would be good if tmortagne  could check  
12:06 <vmassol> actually just this one  
12:06 <vmassol> the other failures can be explained  
12:08 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
13:17 <vmassol> starting to test notifications  
13:29 <acotiuga> has quit  
13:31 <vmassol> so it's not working for me  
14:50 <Ulydev> has joined #xwiki  
15:15 <D-Spair> has quit  
15:18 <msmeria> has quit  
15:19 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
15:20 <D-Spair> has joined #xwiki  
15:53 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
15:56 <lkrejci> vmassol: so debugging it, I can see that the revapi-maven-plugin can't see your revapi.json file... when I look at xwiki-commons-tools-license-resources jar that is referenced, I can't see revapi.json either...  
15:57 <lkrejci> is it in the branch?  
16:06 <vmassol> lkrejci: hi  
16:06 <vmassol> it should be there yes  
16:07 <vmassol> let me verify that the generated resource jar contains it  
16:07 <vmassol> I can see it  
16:07 <vmassol> see https://gist.github.com/vmassol/4ad7d260be547de1cf5ab11edd411e0c  
16:08 <vmassol> oh wait  
16:08 <vmassol> arghhhh  
16:08 <vmassol> I've used a wrong artifact id apparently  
16:08 <vmassol> trying with the right one...  
16:09 <vmassol> used xwiki-commons-tool-license-resources instead of xwiki-commons-tool-verification-resources :(  
16:09 <lkrejci> yeah... when I put revapi.json into ...license-resources, it got past the failing infinispan artifact...  
16:10 <vmassol> I'm really sorry  
16:10 <vmassol> I made you loose your time...  
16:11 <vmassol> you should report a warning or error when revapi cannot find a config file :)  
16:11 <vmassol> hmm I'm still getting a violation but maybe it's some new check from revapi  
16:12 <vmassol> hmm no, it should be ignored normally  
16:12 <vmassol> I'm getting https://gist.github.com/vmassol/fc60e9e04696f57bece617d458c8ca3e  
16:13 <vmassol> putting back the json config I had before to see if it helps  
16:13 <vmassol> (instead of the xml)  
16:14 <vmassol> I think the xml you gave me has removed several fields  
16:17 <vmassol> works!  
16:19 <vmassol> thanks again  
16:22 <lkrejci> great!  
16:22 <lkrejci> I wrote the XML by hand directly in the github comment, so errors are quite probable ;)  
16:25 <vmassol> ahhh ok  
16:26 <vmassol> thought you have executed the new maven goal  
16:26 <vmassol> s/have/had  
16:26 <vmassol> (the converter mojo)  
16:26 <vmassol> I still need to try that  
16:30 <msmeria> has quit  
16:39 <lkrejci> vmassol: https://github.com/revapi/revapi/issues/70 as for why the conversion fails...  
16:39 <vmassol> ok  
16:40 <vmassol> thx  
16:40 <vmassol> trying to run it on a downstream module now  
16:40 <vmassol> errr, no output but not error  
16:41 <lkrejci> vmassol: it updates the pom.xml directly - any JSON config of revapi should be rewritten to XML  
16:41 <Ulydev> has quit  
16:41 <vmassol> it works only on the moduile having the revapi config?  
16:41 <vmassol> (lkrejci)  
16:41 <lkrejci> yes  
16:42 <vmassol> strange  
16:42 <vmassol> git status doesn't shwo any change  
16:42 <vmassol> yep no change done  
16:43 <lkrejci> what module is that?  
16:43 <vmassol> ah ok  if it works only on the modile having the config then that explains it  
16:43 <vmassol> I was running it on a downstream one  
16:43 <vmassol> (since the one with the config is a pom one)  
16:43 <vmassol> ok so I can't run it  
16:43 <vmassol> except by manually moving the config  
16:43 <vmassol> or temporaroly changing the packaging just to generate the xml  
16:43 <vmassol> trying that  
16:45 <vmassol> hmm no, not working either  
16:45 <vmassol> I copied the config to a jar packaging module  
16:45 <vmassol> and after running the mojo, the json is still there  
16:46 <lkrejci> c'mon! :)  
16:49 <lkrejci> that's not fair... I have integration tests for that! :)  
16:51 <lkrejci> vmassol: is the json config in the pom.xml or in a separate file?  
16:53 <vmassol> hehe ;)  
16:53 <vmassol> in the pom.xml  
16:53 <ol-ow2> has joined #xwiki  
16:54 <vmassol> lkrejci: I edited xwiki-commons/xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-component/xwiki-commons-component-api and copied the revapi config from xwiki-commons-core/pom.xml there  
16:54 <vmassol> then I executed mvn clean revapi:convert-config-to-xml -N -e  
16:54 <vmassol> (in xwiki-commons/xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-component/xwiki-commons-component-api /)  
16:55 <ol-ow2> Hi ! there is a way to force to include a doc (contains macros) on page in edit OBJECT mode ? vmassol mflorea  
16:57 <ol-ow2> i'm using macro to show my own displayer fields (custom display)  
16:57 <vmassol> ol-ow2: I don't understand. You have a textarea xproperty and you want to include some doc when that xproperty evaluates at rendering time?  
16:57 <vmassol> so the custom display should include the doc then  
17:00 <ol-ow2> My current custom display is : {{velocity}}#getInputText(){{/velocity}}, then it should be {{include reference="myMacrosPage"//}{{velocity}}#getInputText(){{/velocity}}  
17:00 <ol-ow2> right ? vmassol  
17:00 <mflorea> has quit  
17:01 <ol-ow2> and so for each custom displayer  
17:01 <vmassol> yes, with proper new lines between the macros  
17:01 <vmassol> yes  
17:01 <ol-ow2> ok thanks  
17:01 <ol-ow2> :)  
17:01 <vmassol> the alternative  
17:02 <ol-ow2> yes ?  
17:02 <vmassol> is that you put these velocity macros in macros.vm or another velocimacro for the skin, that's loaded at startup time  
17:02 <vmassol> velocimacros are global macros  
17:03 <vmassol> available from everywhere  
17:03 <vmassol> we have some already in macros.vm  
17:03 <vmassol> but xwiki.properties can be configured to point to several velocimacro files  
17:03 <ol-ow2> ok noticed :)  
17:04 <ol-ow2> and.. another point  
17:04 <vmassol> actually it's xwiki.cfg  
17:04 <vmassol> and the property is xwiki.render.velocity.macrolist  
17:04 <vmassol> if not specified it defaults to /templates/macros.vm  
17:05 <ol-ow2> there is a difficulty to migrate xwiki 6.4.4 to xwiki 9.1 ?  
17:05 <ol-ow2> farm to farm  
17:05 <ol-ow2> or recommandation from you ?  
17:05 <vmassol> I guess the difficulty is nested pages  
17:06 <vmassol> but that's not a big ussue  
17:06 <vmassol> you just need to understand what it means  
17:06 <ol-ow2> i've try a largeExport / import  
17:06 <vmassol> just need to read this page http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/ContentOrganization/#HMigratingtoNestedPages  
17:06 <vmassol> you shouldn't do that  
17:07 <vmassol> you should let xwiki do the migration  
17:07 <vmassol> otherwise you'll loose installed extensio,s activity stream, stats, etc  
17:07 <vmassol> see http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Backup#HUsingtheXWikiExportfeature  
17:11 <ol-ow2> thanks for these infos ;)  
17:12 <ol-ow2> have a nice week-end ! :)  
17:12 <vmassol> np  
17:12 <vmassol> u2  
17:12 <ol-ow2> thx  
17:14 <lkrejci> vmassol: the conversion silently barfs on comments in the JSON  
17:15 <vmassol> ok  
17:15 <vmassol> let me try to remove them  
17:16 <vmassol> hmm same problem
